abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.cannot_connect: Connection to {ekeybionyx} failed. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_available_webhooks: There are no available webhooks in the {ekeybionyx} system. Please delete some and try again.
abort.no_own_systems: Your account does not have admin access to any systems.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.oauth_implementation_unavailable: No OAuth2 implementations are currently available.
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorization error while obtaining access token.

progress.check_deletion_status: Please open the {ekeybionyx} app and confirm the deletion of the functions.

data_description.system: System the event entities should be set up for.

choose_system.description: Please select the {ekeybionyx} system which you want to connect to Home Assistant.

delete_webhooks.description: This system has already been connected to Home Assistant. If you continue, the previously configured functions will be deleted.

data_description.url: Home Assistant instance URL which can be reached from the fingerprint controller
data_description.webhook1: Name of event entity 1 that will be mapped into a function
data_description.webhook2: Name of event entity 2 that will be mapped into a function
data_description.webhook3: Name of event entity 3 that will be mapped into a function
data_description.webhook4: Name of event entity 4 that will be mapped into a function
data_description.webhook5: Name of event entity 5 that will be mapped into a function

webhooks.description: Please name your event entities. These event entities will be mapped as functions in the {ekeybionyx} app. You can configure up to {webhooks_available} event entities. Leaving a name empty will skip the setup of that event entity.
